updates.title: Book dump
updates.description: Some anon scanned some books from some famous mahjong players (and shitters). More in Resources.

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 23/02/22)
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. Added the new emotes for Yui and Sawako's skins in the Moonlight Waltz event

updates.title: Statistical Mahjong Strategy (Updated 17/02/22)
updates.description: It's like riichi book 2, but for math addicts. Fixed some typos.

updates.title: Uzaku's 300 wwyd (beta)
updates.description: Learn about tile efficiency and the feeling of having a girlfriend all in one book! Harder prequel of the 301 book. improved version soon(tm)

updates.title: Touhou Gensou Mahjong 4N translation
updates.description: A translation for the touhou mahjong game with superpowers and all of that. Pretty nice, just remember not to run it on japanese locale.

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 27/01/22)
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. Added the 2 new characters emotes and new CNY emotes.

updates.title: Uzaku's tile efficiency (Updated 18/01/22)
updates.description: From the wwyd-chan author, oyakodon efficiency theory. Almost complete.

updates.title: Statistical Mahjong Strategy (Updated 03/01/22)
updates.description: It's like riichi book 2, but for math addicts. Fixed some typos.

updates.title: Fishing Ichihime v.4pin (Update 02/01/22)
updates.description: Fixes a softlock in endless modes. You can just replace your executable with this one, your save files from previous version will be compatible.

updates.title: Fishing Ichihime v.3pin (Update 01/01/22)
updates.description: It should fix bugs reported in the thread. You can just replace your executable with this one, your save files from previous version will be compatible.

updates.title: Fishing Ichihime
updates.description: Very comfy single player mahjong game, win points to get fish for ichihime.

updates.title: Majsoul emotes (Update 22/12/21)
updates.description: The new majsoul emotes.

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 24/11/21)
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. Added the 2 new halloween emotes from the latest update.

updates.title: Tile Efficiency (wwyd-chan 3)
updates.description: From the wwyd-chan author, now you get oyakodon! Suited to learn beginner tile efficiency. Translation is going on, still quite a good number of typos.

updates.title: Waifu 2x
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. This makes emotes look better on larger screens instead of them looking a bit blurry.

updates.title: Change buttons
updates.description: Replaces 'Riichi', 'Ron' and 'Tsumo' prompts with 'Free Sex', 'Rekt' and 'Skill' respectively.

updates.title: Statistical Mahjong Strategy (Updated)
updates.description: It's like riichi book 2, but for math addicts. Fixed some typos.

updates.title: Arcturus is dead
updates.description: It can't be helped. Site moved to riichi.wiki, hosted by the osamuko guy.

updates.title: Anon's akochan
updates.description: Easier to use than the official build, can even work with majsoul links.

updates.description: Updated with new entries (shiratori, arisa, rui, shibukawa's tulpas)

updates.description: Online EV calculator, looks pretty but of course it's in japanese.

updates.title: Statistical Mahjong Strategy (sms)
updates.description: It's like riichi book 2, but for math addicts. Explains everything with ev, plots, tables and raw numbers. It's being translated by anon, chapters until 2.6 done.

updates.title: Super Zugan ep10 subs
updates.description: Subs of the 9th episode of super zugan. Raws are in the media section.

updates.title: Mahjong Hourouki (1984)
updates.description: Some kind anon got it for us. Directed by Makoto Wada, based on the novel of Tetsuya Asada. 'A mahjong neophyte loses everything to game master only to hone his skills, take on all challenges and plan for an ultimate revenge match.'

updates.title: Comfy Friendly
updates.description: Can play any girl and other people using the script see them too. Used along with Unlock Everybody userscript.

updates.title: Banned from Majsoul+
updates.description: Everyone who uses Majsoul+ is banned for 7 days.

updates.title: To You, 2000 points from Adept
updates.description: Rage, nyaggers!

updates.title: To You, 2000 ranks from now
updates.description: The last fight. Part 2 soon(tm).

updates.title: Riichima nyagger
updates.description: A mod that vastly improves nyagger, by using the pure sex picture from Riichima Financial instead of the bonded pic.

updates.title: Oversees
updates.description: Yes, it's a pun. Shows players' server origin.

updates.title: Party Time
updates.description:
Userscript
Everyone's invited. Press Ctrl+C during a match to get a link to the game. Anyone with the script can use that url to spectate.

updates.title: Wild West Theme
updates.description:
Music BGM Mod
Yeehaw! Presented by team Bandora Bandits, get transported to the wild west and live out your cowbow dreams.

updates.title: /mjg/ League 2
updates.description:
Congratulations to CoolDogz (Kingdomfreak, XSA, mottwww, ワハハ, UncleMoton, 6k5e and SirL) for winning! Who would've expected this outcome, huh?
